alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Flagler, southwestern St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palatka, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, Picolata, Bostwick, Federal Point and Orange Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
